headline: Is It Worth Investing in Devon Energy (DVN) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Devon Energy (DVN) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
